title: SaaSavant
description:
SaaSavant SaaS Boilerplate provides a ready-to-use SaaS application framework. Simply integrate your unique features, and SaaSavant will handle everything else. 

Includes:
- Sign In / Sign Up pages
- Admin / User Dashboards
- Support Ticket System
- Announcement System
- Newsletter / Welcome Email
- Account Management
- Automatic billing through Stripe
- Firebase Auth / Firestore DB
- Landing Page
- Policies
- And MUCH MORE!!!!!!!
